titles.title: CB 165 Clap Your Hands, All Ye Peoples

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
CLAP YOUR HANDS, ALL YE PEOPLES,
Shout unto God with a voice of triumph. Clap
your hands, all ye peoples, shout unto God with a
voice of praise.
Hosanna! Hosanna! Shout unto God with a voice
of triumph.
Praise Him! Praise Him! Shout unto God with a
voice of praise.
